#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

int main()
{
	int t;
	const char w[23] = "welcome to conscientia";
	// const char w[23] = "abc";
	char s[201];
	int c[24][201];

	scanf("%d", &t);

	gets(s);

	for (int i = 0; i < t; i++)
	{
		gets(s);

		for (unsigned int j = 0; j < strlen("welcome to conscientia"); j++)
		{
			c[j][0] = 0;
		}

		for (unsigned int j = 0; j < strlen(s); j++)
		{
			c[0][j] = 0;
		}

		for (unsigned int j = 0; j < strlen("welcome to conscientia"); j++)
		{
			for (unsigned int k = 0; k < strlen(s); k++)
			{
				if (w[j] == s[k])
				{
					if ((j == 0) && (k == 0))
					{
						c[j][k] = 1;
					}
					else if ((j > 0) && (k == 0))
					{
						c[j][k] = c[j - 1][k];
					}
					else if ((j == 0) && (k > 0))
					{
						c[j][k] = c[j][k - 1] + 1;
					}
					else
					{
						c[j][k] = c[j][k - 1] + c[j - 1][k];
					}
				}
				else
				{
					if (k == 0)
					{
						c[j][k] = 0;
					}
					else
					{
						c[j][k] = c[j][k - 1];
					}
				}
			}
		}

		printf("%d\n", c[strlen("welcome to conscientia") - 1][strlen(s) - 1]);
	}
}
